title: An Attack on asthma
creator_credit: Academy Film Productions and Ronald Mason
brief_description: Describes the effects of asthma on the respiratory system and what is being done to find a cure and more effective techniques of treatment. The Asthma Foundation of Victoria’s role in helping the social and economic problems of asthma patients is outlined
